directions: Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Sear the squirrel and liver until browned on the outside. Transfer to a slow cooker. Add the onions, carrots, bell pepper and garlic. Stir in the tomato juice. Season with salt, pepper, oregano, thyme and bay leaf. Cover, and cook on High for 6 hours.
ingredients: 2 squirrels - skinned, gutted, and cut into pieces
2 pounds beef liver, sliced into thin strips
1 green bell pepper, seeded and sliced into strips
title: Slow Cooker Squirrel and Liver
